weka.classifiers.collective.util

Class FlipHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.collective.util.FlipHistory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FlipHistory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A flipping algorithm, that flips the label only if the previous and the current (possibly new) label disagree more than a certain percentage.
    Version:
    $Revision: 2019 $
    Author:
    Kurt Driessens (kurtd at cs dot waikato dot ac dot nz), FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
